EmailTemplate.description: Email Template to use in notifying Partner Account Managers about new Partner Lead
EmailTemplate.name: Email Template about Partner Lead
EmailTemplate.subject: New Partner Lead, '{!Lead.Full_Name__c}' added to our CRM
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Partner Account Managers,
This is to inform you that there is a new partner lead, '{!Lead.Name}', from Company, '{!Lead.Company}', is created in our CRM.
CRM link for the lead record: {!Lead.Link}
Please reach out to Lead Owner, '{!Lead.OwnerFullName}', and/or SDR, '{!Lead.SDR__c}', for additional information.
Thank You!
